text.tspan: when X => if gt3 then at3; procState := Y;
elsif gt4 then at4; procState := Z;
Proc. SM is enabled by t2 setting procState := ENABLED
type ProcStates is (X, Y, Z, FINISHED);
at represents the translated actions of transition t and
gt represents the translated guards of transition t.
t2 sets enables the proc statemachine directly
